Package org.trianacode.gui.hci.color

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BackgroundColorModel  
    CableColorModel  
    ColorModel
    An interface used to link colors in the ColorTable with graphical elements.
    NodeColorModel
    An extended color model that handles colors for nodes.
    RegisterableColorModel  
    TrianaColorConstants
    Constants for color names and graphical elements used by standard Triana components
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorManager
    The ColorManager maintains a register of ColorModels for different tool class types, and a default ColorModel which handles tool class types and color elements not handled by a specific ColorModel.
    ColorTable
    A lookup table between color names and actual color values
    ColorTableEntry
    Container class for color name/color object pairs
